data.title: B Site Execute Fast Lane + Relay Bolts Combo
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective Fast Lane + Relay Bolts combo that can be used to execute onto B Site from B Main. Just tell your teammates to be careful of close left and close right as you are pushing into Site for your team.

data.title: Early Round Relay Bolt to Push up A Ramp
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective Relay Bolt that can be used to push up A Ramp at the beginning of the round from A Main. Just be careful of enemy players holding the A Main cross / pushing into A Main as you push up the ramp.
